New Records: Finn Allen scored 137 runs in 62 balls with 16 sixes
Key Match Events: Finn Allen's monstrous knock of 137 runs led to a 45-run victory for New Zealand
Post-Match Reflections: Finn Allen stated that he wanted to keep it simple, stay deep in the crease, and hit through the line
Miscellaneous Highlights: Haris Rauf had a horrific outing, conceding 60 runs in 4 overs
Others: The hosts, New Zealand, sealed the series with an unassailable 3-0 lead with two games to go
